title: AI Memory Chipmaker SK Hynix Weighs New York Stock Listing
description: SK Hynix Inc. is exploring the possibility of listing shares in New York, a move seen potentially helping close the valuation gap between the South Korean chipmaker and US peers including Micron Technology Inc.
content: SK Hynix Inc. is exploring the possibility of listing shares in New York, a move seen potentially helping close the valuation gap between the South Korean chipmaker and US peers including Micron Technology Inc.
